body_html:
Here's the fix for anyone wondering:

scottmudge@8a6e5b2
And make things a little cleaner:
scottmudge@66495e5

You have to define two variations of _mm256_extract_epi8 and _mm256_extract_epi16, both where offset is either 0 or 1 (only two used), and put them in PacketMathAVX2.h.

MSVC2015 does not offer _mm256_extract_epi8, -16, -32, or -64 in the immintrin.h header, nor in their runtimes, so it has to be implemented manually.
body_text:
Here's the fix for anyone wondering:
scottmudge@8a6e5b2
And make things a little cleaner:
scottmudge@66495e5
You have to define two variations of _mm256_extract_epi8 and _mm256_extract_epi16, both where offset is either 0 or 1 (only two used), and put them in PacketMathAVX2.h.
MSVC2015 does not offer _mm256_extract_epi8, -16, -32, or -64 in the immintrin.h header, nor in their runtimes, so it has to be implemented manually.
body:
Here's the fix for anyone wondering: 

https://github.com/ScottMudge/tensorflow/commit/8a6e5b2272b5ae7bbf2bfe5d717467b0e3737c7c
And make things a little cleaner:
https://github.com/ScottMudge/tensorflow/commit/66495e5e981b10ae65ce3f0b716f62efd65e24dc

You have to define two variations of _mm256_extract_epi8 and _mm256_extract_epi16, both where offset is either 0 or 1 (only two used), and put them in PacketMathAVX2.h.

MSVC2015 does not offer _mm256_extract_epi8, -16, -32, or -64 in the immintrin.h header, nor in their runtimes, so it has to be implemented manually.
